text:
A two-year old boy drowned in a floor-level water tank here in Kadathur on Sunday. According to police, the incident occurred when the boy Nilavan, son of Nithyavathy (23) and Selvam (25), was playing his house and accidentally slipped into an open floor-level water tank.

Police said the Selvam, a wage labourer, was out on work, while Nithyavathy was cooking in the kitchen.
title: Boy found dead
